TextEng: "I'm sorry, I seem to have lost the amulet you gave me."
"How does this amulet you gave me work?"
"Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"What do you mean by your Pilgrims?"
"How does one travel from plane to plane?"
"How can I make the Reaper do my bidding?"
Text: "사신을 제 뜻대로 따르게 하려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?"

TextEng: "What do you mean 'until he dreams the answer'?"
"What can you tell me about the planes?"
"I need to find a way back home."
"How do you know all of this about him?"
Text: "그에 대해 이 모든 것을 어떻게 아십니까?"

TextEng: "How does one travel from plane to plane?"
"How can I make the Reaper do my bidding?"
Text: "사신을 제 뜻대로 따르게 하려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?"

"How can I make the Reaper do my bidding?"
Text: "사신을 제 뜻대로 따르게 하려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?"

TextEng: "What do you mean 'until he dreams the answer'?"
"What can you tell me about the planes?"
"I wish to recite the Five-Fold Mysteries and see the Sleeping Man."
Text: "오중 수수께끼를 암송하고 잠자는 자를 뵙고 싶습니다."

TextEng: "A devilish fiend and servant of Mephistopheles."
"He hails from my home in the world of Toril."
"He hails from the prisons of Carceri."
"He hails from the ever-changing plane of Limbo."
"He hails from the Heavens of Celestia."
"He hails from the Blessed Fields of Elysium."
"He grew bored of beauty and sought, instead, the horrible."
Text: "아름다움에 싫증을 느끼고, 대신 끔찍한 것을 추구했습니다."

TextEng: "A seed of evil grew within him."
"He was cast out as a traitor."
"He sought you, Sensei, and hoped to gain from your wisdom."
"A she-devil renowned for her great beauty."
"'She will find you by the Gates of Cania.'"
Text: "'그녀가 카니아의 문 옆에서 당신을 찾을 것이다.'"

Text: "사신을 제 뜻대로 따르게 하려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?"

TextEng: "What do you mean 'until he dreams the answer'?"
"What can you tell me about the planes?"
"How do I learn my True Name?"
"You read my name upon my brow?"
"How does one travel from plane to plane?"
"How can I make the Reaper do my bidding?"
Text: "사신을 제 뜻대로 따르게 하려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?"

TextEng: "What do you mean 'until he dreams the answer'?"
"I wish to recite the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"A devilish fiend and servant of Mephistopheles."
"He hails from my home in the world of Toril."
"He hails from the prisons of Carceri."
"He hails from the ever-changing plane of Limbo."
"He hails from the Heavens of Celestia."
"He hails from the Blessed Fields of Elysium."
"He grew bored of beauty and sought, instead, the horrible."
Text: "아름다움에 싫증을 느끼고, 대신 끔찍한 것을 추구했습니다."

TextEng: "A seed of evil grew within him."
"He was cast out as a traitor."
"He sought you, Sensei, and hoped to gain from your wisdom."
"A she-devil renowned for her great beauty."
"'She will find you by the Gates of Cania.'"
Text: "'그녀가 카니아의 문 옆에서 당신을 찾을 것이다.'"

TextEng: "What can you tell me about the planes?"
"How have you and your flock fared while I was away?"
"I have learned the identity of his one true love."
"It is a celestial deva named Lavoera."
"I have learned the Sleeping Man's True Name."
"You are right, sensei. True Names are dangerous and to be kept secret."
Text: "사부님 말씀이 맞습니다. 진명은 위험하니 비밀로 해야죠."

TextEng: "The Sleeping Man is called Celesfa'ar the Patient."
"I don't understand. Why wouldn't you want to know his name?"
Text: "이해가 안 됩니다. 왜 그의 이름을 알고 싶지 않으신 겁니까?"

TextEng: "You are the Sleeping Man's one true love."
"Reconcile yourself with the tiefling called Arden Swift."
"Abandon your faith. Put the Sleeping Man behind you."
"I command you to wake the Sleeping Man..."
